## utils.dom.getFastTextWidthWithSizeString() function

Gets the width of a text element using a faster method than `getTextWidth`<!-- -->. This method requires that we know the text element's font family and size in advance. Similar to `getTextWidth`<!-- -->, we cache the width we compute. This method is similar to \`\`<!-- -->getFastTextWidth<!-- -->\`\` but expects the font size parameter to be a string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getFastTextWidthWithSizeString(textElement: Element, fontSize: string, fontWeight: string, fontFamily: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  textElement | Element | An SVG 'text' element. |
|  fontSize | string | The font size to use. |
|  fontWeight | string | The font weight to use. |
|  fontFamily | string | The font family to use.  Width of element.  Blockly.utils.dom.getFastTextWidthWithSizeString |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
